title: vrSAngam bhajarE
sahitya:
vrSAngam bhajarE mAnasa vividha karma bhavam tyajarE mAnasa


anupallavi

  viSAda haram vimala caritam niSAda vESam nirjara tOSam


caraNam    rAja virAjita ramya jaTAngam ramaNI maNDita ramya vAmAngam
AjAnubAhum harikEshapura gEham akhilANDa kOTi brahmANDa nAyakam
